channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal appeals court judge is accused of bullying her clerks

item.title: Policy relief for family caregivers seems stalled out. But there are signs of change
item.description: Family members carry the burden and costs of caring for America's aging population. Federal policy change is slow to come but a new movement and state...

item.title: More Rain Forecast for Los Angeles Starting on New Year’s Eve
item.description: After Christmas-week storms, two rounds of rainfall starting on New Year’s Eve could cause more flooding and mudslides.

item.title: PostNord, Denmark’s Main Postal Carrier, Ends Letter Delivery
item.description: PostNord, the country’s longtime service, is delivering its last letters. Few Danes send snail mail anymore, but some are mourning the end of an era.

item.title: Trump, Netanyahu meet over ceasefire. And, Russia accuses Ukraine of attempted strike

item.title: K-Pop Group NewJeans Faces New Uncertainty After Member Is Dropped
item.description: The band’s label said it had dropped one of the girl group’s five members. NewJeans’s legal battle has drawn public scrutiny of the K-pop industry.

item.title: Thousands watch livestream of Maine family's food pantry for deer

item.title: China Fires Rockets Near Taiwan in Display of Military Power
item.description: China’s military also sent warships and aircraft during a second day of exercises designed to show its ability to claim the democratic island.

item.description: PostNord, the country’s longtime service, is delivering its last letters. Few Danes send snail mail anymore, but some are mourning the end of an era.

item.title: Eurostar Cancels All Trains After Power Failure in Channel Tunnel
item.description: The high-speed train service connecting Britain and continental Europe was paralyzed on Tuesday during one of the busiest travel weeks of the year.
